## NestJSSigmaOtpModule.register() method

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

**Signature:**

```typescript
static register(settings: ISigmaOtpSDKControllersSettings): {
		module: typeof NestJSSigmaOtpModule;
		controllers: {
			new (): {
				sigmaOtpSDK: SigmaOtpSDK;
				getWidget(widgetId: string): Promise<IOtpWidgetData>;
				sendOtp(body: {
					widgetId: string;
					recipient: string;
				}): Promise<IOtpSendData>;
				resend(requestId: string): Promise<IOtpGetStatusData>;
				getChannel(requestId: string): Promise<IOtpChannelData>;
				waitForChannelSelected(requestId: string): Promise<IOtpChannelData>;
				checkStatus(requestId: string, recipient: string): Promise<IOtpGetStatusData>;
				waitForSuccessStatus(requestId: string, recipient: string): Promise<IOtpGetStatusData>;
				verifyCode(requestId: string, body: {
					code: string;
				}): Promise<IOtpGetStatusData>;
				completeRequest(requestId: string): Promise<IOtpGetStatusData>;
			};
		}[];
	};
```
